description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up environment variables, theme, routing, and Provider-based state management.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme, routes, and Providers using Flutter's StatelessWidget.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the app.

methods.name: MyApp.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, providing theme, routing, and state management setup.
